national_indicators_available:
• Implementation and progress on national targets in accordance with or similar to Aichi Biodiversity Target 2 of the Strategic Plan for Biodiversity 2011-2020
  • Implementation of the System of Environmental-Economic Accounting (SEEA)
comparison_sdg: The time series are compliant with the global metadata.
goal_meta_national_link_text: Metadata on the presented time series
indicator_name: (a) Number of countries that have established national targets in accordance with or similar to Aichi Biodiversity Target 2 of the Strategic Plan for Biodiversity 2011–2020 in their national biodiversity strategy and action plans and the progress reported towards these targets; and (b) integration of biodiversity into national accounting and reporting systems, defined as implementation of the System of Environmental-Economic Accounting
target_name: By 2020, integrate ecosystem and biodiversity values into national and local planning, development processes, poverty reduction strategies and accounts
un_designated_tier: Tier I/II
un_custodian_agency:
Secretariat of the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD-Secretariat)
United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP)
source_organisation_1: Secretariat of the Convention on Biological Diversity
source_url_text_1: Sixth National Report for the Convention on Biological Diversity
source_url_text_2: Reports on the Global Assessment of Environmental-Economic Accounting and Supporting Statistics

footer_fields.series: Implementation and progress on national targets in accordance with or similar to Aichi Biodiversity Target 2 of the Strategic Plan for Biodiversity 2011-2020
footer_fields.label: Notes
footer_fields.value:
• 0.0 = No national target reflecting Aichi Biodiversity Target 2.
• 0.2 = National target exists, but moving away from it.
• 0.4 = National target exists, but no progress.
• 0.6 = National target exists and progress is there, but at as insufficient rate.
• 0.8 = National target exists and progress is on track to achieve it.
• 1.0 = National target exists and progress is on track to exceed it.
• Data is only available from 2019.

footer_fields.series: Implementation of the System of Environmental-Economic Accounting (SEEA)
footer_fields.label: Notes
footer_fields.value:
• 0 = No compilation of accounts.
• 1 = Compilation of accounts.
• 2 = Dissemination of accounts.
• 3 = Regular compilation and dissemination of accounts.

graph_title: a) Number of countries that established national targets in accordance with Aichi Biodiversity Target 2 of the Strategic Plan for Biodiversity 2011–2020 in their National Biodiversity Strategy and Action Plan (NBSAP) and the progress reported towards these targets
